"'The Hollow'" is a single from A Perfect Circle's 2000 album [[Mer de Noms]].
It serves as the opening track of the album, utilizing layered guitars. "The
Hollow" was recorded in the key of B Flat Minor and is arranged using a 6/8 time
signature. Recorded Versions Guitar, A Perfect Circle - Mer De Noms,
transcriptions by Pete Billmann, Jeff Jacobson, Matt Scharfglass, and Jeff Story
(2000 EMI VIRGIN MUSIC INC., TOOLSHED MUSIC and TRANSFIXED MUSIC)
